mapper.sql: id as id, facility_id as facilityId, container_id as containerId, container_code as containerCode, batch as batch, wave_code as waveCode, ou_id as ouId, outer_container_id as outerContainerId, outer_container_code as outerContainerCode, container_lattice_no as containerLatticeNo, outboundbox_id as outboundboxId, outboundbox_code as outboundboxCode, print_type as printType, print_count as printCount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_print_info ( id, facility_id , container_id , container_code , batch , wave_code , ou_id , outer_container_id , outer_container_code , container_lattice_no , outboundbox_id , outboundbox_code , print_type , print_count ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{facilityId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{containerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{containerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{batch,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{waveCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outerContainerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outerContainerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{containerLatticeNo,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{outboundboxId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundboxCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{printType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{printCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_print_info SET facility_id = #{facilityId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , container_id = #{containerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , container_code = #{containerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , batch = #{batch,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , wave_code = #{waveCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , outer_container_id = #{outerContainerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , outer_container_code = #{outerContainerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , container_lattice_no = #{containerLatticeNo,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , outboundbox_id = #{outboundboxId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , outboundbox_code = #{outboundboxCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , print_type = #{printType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , print_count = #{printCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id}
